description: A short hike to a fall close to the TCH on Boularderie Island.   This is a fall I last visited in 2006 or so.  There might be a trail to it by now.  If not just head into the woods off the road and go upstream on the brook.  The fall is a nice triangular shape and about 20ft.   It's easy to get to and not very far from the road.
directions: TCH  to Big Harbour Rd.  follow the road to approx  46°13'36.55"N,  60°30'56.78"W and head upstream
title: Gunn Brook Fall
